name: Bramble
preparation:
Famed bartender Dick Bradsell invented this classic at Fred’s Club in London’s Soho in the ’80s, inspired by the fresh blackberries he used to get as a child on the Isle of Wight.

Add the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup into a shaker with ice and shake.

Fine-strain into an Old Fashioned glass over crushed ice.

Lace over top with the creme de mure.

Garnish with a lemon half-wheel and a fresh blackberry.
